desc:
Please advise if the Debt Review Flag status is being included in SW Credit Reports (all bureaus). As per Shaun this is being provided directly to the consumer from TU and other bureaus. 

A debt review flag is a quick notification and debt review order is that being granted by court. 

If the DR flag status is not being included, please ensure this change is added to the system

Emailed the original log through to dev for further details.
name: SW - Debt review flag - credit reports
